events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but it doesn't fit at all. I want to return it and get a full refund as soon as possible.
The customer issue was identified as a refund request due to sizing problems and a desire to return the product.
Assigning support agent specialized in returns and refunds to handle this case.
Hello! I’m here to help you with your return and refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed smoothly, may I also know if the product has been used or if the tags are still attached?
The order number is 123456789, and the jacket is brand new. I haven't worn it and the tags are all intact.
Thank you for the info. We can arrange a prepaid return shipping label for you and will process your refund once we receive the jacket.
That sounds perfect. I appreciate the quick response and clear instructions on the return process.
I’ve sent you the return shipping label by email. Once you send the jacket back, the refund will be credited to your account within 5 business days.
Just following up to confirm if you were able to return the jacket and if the refund has been processed to your satisfaction.
Yes, I returned the jacket last week and received the refund today. Thank you very much for your assistance and support.
Glad to hear everything was resolved. Closing this case now. Feel free to reach out anytime for further help.
